resources.string: "Its characteristic features are narrow, heart-shaped, and elongated leaves of dark green color. The leaf impresses with its shiny surface, on which clearly bright, silvery lines of veins are outlined. The most characteristic of Pink Dragon is very decorative, pink-colored, slender, and long petiole."

"Has valuable healing properties. Aloe vera pulp is a natural germicide, regenerates the mucosa and skin, has anti-inflammatory properties, and stimulates the immune system. Forms a rosette of thick and chunky leaves."

"Colloquially known as the "tree of happiness". The characteristic thing is small oval-shaped leaves. The leaf blades are decorated with a delicate burgundy rim. The plant is very easy to grow and does not require special care."

"A potted plant with beautiful, light green, feathery leaves. In nature, this species appears in the tropical forests of southern Mexico and Guatemala, where it grows under a crown of tall trees. This species grows very slowly, releasing about 2â€“3 leaves per year."

"Sansevieria, due to its incredible resistance to water shortage, is called the "iron plant". What Sansievierias have in common is that they adapt well to harsh conditions. It's a very fashionable indoor plant with versatile use, it fits perfectly into modern interiors."

"Sophora prostrata comes from New Zealand and is a small shrub that under proper conditions reaches 1,5 m height and 1 m width. Its greatest decoration is unusual twisted sprigs, thanks to which the plant gains an original and very decorative appearance. It grows quite slowly and can be grown as a natural bonsai tree."

"It distinguishes itself by short growth and beautiful leaf color. It creates a straight and dense habit with decorative leafy sprigs. They captivate with their beautiful and uneven color and pinnate-complex shape."

"It's an indoor plant with low needings, very resistant to neglect, and harsh conditions. This interesting specimen can be found in eastern and north-eastern Africa, where the climate is dry, equatorial. It's an elegant interior decoration and doesn't grow too dynamically."

string-array.name: alocasia_care_tips
string-array.item: "Watering: Likes a lot of water and high air humidity. It's advisable to spritz the leaves with water quite often"
"Place: Bright, but not with direct sunlight"
"Repotting: When the space for the root system in the pot is too small"

string-array.name: aloe_care_tips
string-array.item: "Watering: Rarely, only when the top layer of soil is dry"
"Repotting: When the space for the root system in the pot is too small"

string-array.name: sophora_care_tips
string-array.item: "Watering: Likes high air humidity. Bottom watering is recommended. Do not sprinkle the leaves (causes rotting)."
"Place: Bright, but not with direct sunlight"
"Repotting: Avoid. Only when the space for the root system in the pot is visibly too small"
"Soil: Light, with drainage and coconut chips"
